data.text: Di ahina kaedahi humalia, do aloho la guu hana gi hee?
Dogu aloho la guu hana gi dana hadagee
Dogu aloho la ni aagu, gei au ni mee.
Dogu aloho, do madanga e hai gadoo be Jerusalem,
Huluhia o golomada gi daha mo au,
Oo niha e kene gadoo be di buini siibi ala dogo lawa di gaugau.
O gauwae e maahina mai i tua doo mee gahu golomada.
Di king gi heia ono lodo e modoono,
Gei au dagu dangada hua e dahi dela e aloho iei au,
Au ne haneia gi lala i mehanga nia laagau ‘almond’
Au gu bolebole mo di tenetene.
Gaalege, gaalege, go tama ahina o Shulam,
